content.full_text:
Report of Abraham Lincoln, Michael Killion, and Hugh Armstrong to the Sangamon County

Commissioners’ Court, June 18341
paragraphs: Report of Abraham Lincoln, Michael Killion, and Hugh Armstrong to the Sangamon County
citations:
Sangamon County Commissioners’ Court Record Book D, Manuscripts Department, Abraham
                     Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum, Springfield, IL.

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincoln wrote the body of the text and signed his own name. He also authored
                  the survey map on page three, which was not transcribed here.Killion, Armstrong, and Lincoln presented their report to the Sangamon County Commissioners’
                  Court on June 2, 1834.Sangamon County Commissioners’ Court Record Book D, Manuscripts Department, Abraham
                     Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum, Springfield, IL.
2Lincoln and  Armstrong had signed apetitionsent to thecourtfour months earlier requesting that the road be located.
